name: Creative Lab Projects
title: I thought this was super NDA???
desc: Currently my projects at the Google Creative Lab are still under NDA. Video is from Google IO 2021 (and completely unrelated ðŸ˜Š).

name: Ambient Computationally Intelligent Technology
title: Ambient tech? What the heck?
desc: Ambient Compuationally Intelligent Technology was my senior thesis within the Communications Design Program at Pratt. This idea takes a speculative look at the future and how technology integrates into our lives. When does it become so closely a part of us as a species that it reconnects into the human experience/ethos?

name: GMessage!
title: Google making a messaging service? Yeah right.
desc: Google has made a plethora of different messaging services over the past decade, and yet none of them have survived, let alone be successful. Ultimately, none of them could live up to iMessage, but Google has had an ace up their sleeve the whole time... Chrome. I created this speculative app to explore the possibility of a unified Google Messaging Platform. Check out the Medium article which goes into more depth and research.

name: Fun Side Projects :)
title: There's a whole lotta stuff in here!
desc: This is a page of stuff that doesn't really require a full case study. There are things like Zorp Instant Message, which is a messaging service to a deity. There are AR cards that show their number only in AR. There's a reel I created for Zero Studios. There is Publikation, an online zine I did with friends. There's even Can You Bing It, a site exploring if Bing can search as much as Google. And there's a whole lotta other stuff too!

name: Print Projects
title: CNTRL P
desc: While I am mainly a digital centric designer, I still love books and tactile print. The video is a companion piece to the book Re-View. Along with that book, there are various zines I've done along with Design, Design!, Designed? â†’ A book I created that showcases multiple essays from various different designers. Books are available to look at upon request!
